data.code:
<script>
  const modalEdit = document.getElementById('modalEdit');
  const modalDelete = document.getElementById('modalDelete');
  const tutupEdit = document.getElementById('tutupEdit');
  const tutupDelete = document.getElementById('tutupDelete');

  // === Modal Edit ===
  function openEditModal(id, title, desc, image) {
    document.getElementById('editId').value = id;
    document.getElementById('editTitle').value = title;
    document.getElementById('editDescription').value = desc;
    document.getElementById('editOldImage').value = image || '';
    modalEdit.classList.remove('hidden');
  }

  tutupEdit.addEventListener('click', () => {
    modalEdit.classList.add('hidden');
  });

  // === Modal Delete ===
  function openDeleteModal(id) {
    document.getElementById('deleteId').value = id;
    modalDelete.classList.remove('hidden');
  }

  tutupDelete.addEventListener('click', () => {
    modalDelete.classList.add('hidden');
  });

  // Tutup modal jika klik area luar
  window.addEventListener('click', (e) => {
    if (e.target === modalEdit) modalEdit.classList.add('hidden');
    if (e.target === modalDelete) modalDelete.classList.add('hidden');
  });
</script>
